This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook in DEP2 buildup

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = T,
  eval = F, ## do not eval when export html
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "man/figures/README-",
  out.width = "100%"
)
```

# perpare step

## library neccesarry package

```{r split=FALSE}
library(devtools)
library(usethis)
library(testthat)
library(dplyr)
```

## Link github
```{r split=FALSE}
use_git()
usethis::use_git_remote(  ## 导入具体仓库信息. ssh方法。推荐方法
  "origin",
  "git@github.com:mildpiggy/DEP2.git",
  overwrite = TRUE
)
usethis::git_remotes() 
usethis::use_git_config()
```

## format DESCRIPTION
```{r}
usethis::use_tidy_description()
```

## creat readme.rmd
```{r}
use_readme_rmd()
build_readme() 
```

## creat license file, use mit license
```{r}
use_mit_license() ##生成mit license 的 LICENSE 和 LICENSER.md
```
